contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Non-free use rationale|Description=Wilfred Benitez and his mother Clara Benitez (smiling, left) |Source=http://wilfredbenitez.com/Gallery/Gallery.htm |Portion=Entire photo |Low_resolution=Yes |Article=Wilfred BenÃ­tez |Purpose=To show Wilfred Benitez and his mother while Mr. Benitez was still boxing. The photo helps the reader get a sense of how they were and what they looked like during Mr. Benitez boxing career. |Replaceability=No; Wilfred Benitez no longer boxes professionally. |other_information=Mr. Benitez and the site webmaster have given personal permission to Antonio Martin for this picture to be used. }} Prepared by Adrian Pingstone, at Antonio's request, in February 2004. == Licensing == {{Non-free fair use in|Wilfred Benitez|image has rationale=yes}}
